name: Bricks -- Lite
description:
The history of Bricks-Breaker game goes back to 1972 introduction of arcade Pong game. Can you believe it, that original versions didn't have color and instead had colored pieces of cellophane placed on the screen? Well, now we are proud to bring this classic back to you in a tiny download package.
Tilt the phone to control the paddle to prevent the ball from falling off the screen. Clear the screen of the bricks to earn high score and advance to the next level. Use menu (top right corner) to restart the game and check the score.
Don't forget to check our Game section for other fun games...
